name: Drawn Thin
description: Some things are just too different to work together. Some game genres are mutually exclusive. You can’t have a turn-based real time strategy game, you can’t have a single player party game, and you most definitely can’t have a card-based bullet hell. Or can you? The main goal of Drawn Thin is to take the two magnetically opposed genres of bullet hells and card games and find where they meet in sweet symphony.
